          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical apparatus for heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemischer Apparat für Heizung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appareil chimique pour le chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumento químico para o heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apparecchio chimico per il heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές συσκευές για</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aparato químico para la calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations, showing the correct way for a pupil to draw some standard laboratory apparatus for heating.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal gauze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tripod</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die korrekte Methode
zeigend, damit eine Pupille irgendeinen Standardlaborapparat für 
Heizung zeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations, montrant la voie 
correcte pour qu'une pupille dessine un certain appareil de 
laboratoire standard pour le chauffage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações, mostrando a 
maneira correta para que uma pupila desenhe algum instrumento de 
laboratório padrão para o heating.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni, mostrando il
modo corretto affinchè una pupilla estraggano qualche dispositivo di 
laboratorio standard per il heating.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων, που εμφανίζουν σωστό τρόπο 
για έναν μαθητή να σύρει μερικές πρότυπες εργαστηριακές 
συσκευές για.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones, mostrando la manera
correcta para que una pupila trace un poco de aparato de laboratorio 
estándar para la calefacción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bunsenbrenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasbrenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallgaze</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
